text: RK Vogošća Poljine Hills is a Bosnian handball team located in Vogošća. Their home matches are played at Sportska Dvorana Amel Bečković. They compete in Handball Championship of Bosnia and Herzegovina where their best result is 2nd in 2015-2016. == Accomplishments == * Premijer Liga ** Runner-Up (2) : 2016, 2018 ==European record == {| class="wikitable" ! Season ! Competition ! Round ! Club ! 1st leg ! 2nd leg !
